thread.title: While Cops Got Orders from Rosie to Turn on Trump, They Got Touching Visit from Mark Wahlberg
thread.title_full: While Cops Got Orders from Rosie to Turn on Trump, They Got Touching Visit from Mark Wahlberg

author: Ben Marquis
title: While Cops Got Orders from Rosie to Turn on Trump, They Got Touching Visit from Mark Wahlberg
text:
BREAKING: Ted Cruz Introduces Bill to Classify Muslim Brotherhood as Terror Org 
Meanwhile, as Rosie O’Donnell called for martial law and demanded that police and military service members go against the will of the people and put a stop to the inauguration of the man duly elected to be the next president, another celebrity was taking the time to actually speak with and pay homage to the men and women O’Donnell would have disrupt life as we know it in America. 
According to the Independent Journal Review , actor Mark Wahlberg visited Des Moines, Iowa, on Monday, in part to pay tribute to a pair of fallen officers the community had recently lost. 
Wahlberg met with the families and fellow officers of Urbandale police officer Justin Martin and Des Moines police Sgt. Anthony Beminio, who were shot and killed separately in a related ambush in November . 
While there, Wahlberg also attended a special “invite only” screening of his new movie “Patriots Day,” which chronicled the actions of first responders in Boston following the 2013 terrorist attack on the famous marathon. 
“’Patriots Day’ is a tribute to law enforcement and anyone who commits to serving their community and country,” Wahlberg explained of the message behind the film, set to be released nationwide on Friday. 
While Mark Wahlberg has always stood out from the rest of the Hollywood crowd, he certainly distinguished himself from the whiny liberals in the aftermath of Trump’s election, when he scolded them for getting involved in politics and informed them that the general public really didn’t care about their political opinions and only wants to watch them perform. 
Perhaps Rosie O’Donnell could take a lesson from Wahlberg, both in understanding that her opinion carries no more weight than anyone else’s, and in how to treat the men and women who place their lives on the line to protect the nation and their community, who most certainly DO NOT want to be called out to impose martial law against the inauguration of the next president. 
Please share this on Facebook and Twitter so everyone can see the major difference between two Hollywood celebrities. What do you think of the stark difference in attitude between these two celebrities? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
